text: Aur tera perwerdigar saaf saaf hukum dey chuka hai kay tum uss kay siwa kissi aur ki ibadat na kerna aur maa baap kay sath ehsan kerna. Agar teri mojoodgi mein inn mein say aik ya yeh dono burhapay ko phonch jayen to unn kay aagay uff tak na kehna na unhen daant dapat kerna bulkay unn kay sath adab-o-ehtram say baat cheet kerna
